text: Welcome {name} to {company_name} Education Services. You have successfully enrolled in text message notifications.

email.subject: Welcome to {company_name} Education Services
email.body:
Hey {name},

This email is being sent to notify you that an account has been created for you on our training platform. If you have any questions, please call our office at {company_phone}.

Please login to your account here: {company_url}

Respectfully,

{company_name}

P: {company_phone}

E: {company_email}
